name: pipegate-sdk
description: A TypeScript client-side payment authentication SDK for stablecoins used with axios

scripts.cjs:build: tsc --outDir dist/cjs --module CommonJS && mkdir -p dist/cjs/wasm && cp -r src/wasm/cjs/* ./dist/cjs/wasm
scripts.esm:build: tsc --outDir dist/esm --module ESNext && mkdir -p dist/esm/wasm && cp src/wasm/pipegate.js src/wasm/pipegate.d.ts src/wasm/pipegate_bg.wasm.d.ts ./dist/esm/wasm
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run cjs:build && npm run esm:build
